1.details: 1. Test sign-up functionality with various scenarios. 2. Test sign-in process. 3. Check for console errors. 4. Verify Supabase authentication configuration.

2.details: 1. Test form submission at each step. 2. Identify where form failures occur. 3. Check for specific error messages. 4. Verify data persistence between steps.

3.details: 1. Check console logs during registration. 2. Identify JavaScript errors. 3. Check network requests. 4. Verify API responses.

4.details: 1. End-to-end registration test. 2. Database verification. 3. Email verification process. 4. Dashboard access after registration.

5.details: 1. Execute all Playwright tests. 2. Generate comprehensive test report. 3. Document all failures and fixes. 4. Verify all authentication flows work.
